full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 201 of 261 1362 LC6VMAX6 Maguire - direct 1 Q. What type of building is located at that address? 2 A. It's a large private residence. I would describe it as a multi-story townhouse. 4 MS. MOE: Your Honor, may we publish what's in evidence as Government Exhibit 932? 5 6 THE COURT: Without objection? 7 MR. EVERDELL: One moment, your Honor. 8 Without objection. 9 THE COURT: 932, which is in evidence, may be published. 10 11 MS. MOE: Your Honor, may I have just a moment? 12 THE COURT: Yes. 13 MS. MOE: Thank you, your Honor. 14 BY MS. MOE: 15 Q. Special Agent Maguire, what are we looking at in Government Exhibit 932? 16 17 A. This is from the exterior of the residence. If you were standing on East 71st Street facing it, these would be the upper floors of the residence. 18 19 20 Q. How many floors were there in this particular residence? 21 A. There were eight in total, six aboveground and two sublevels. 22 23 Q. Approximately how many square feet was this particular residence on the interior? 24 25 A. Approximately 19,000 square feet. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018538
